name: Five More Minutes (Rainsong, Draconimous)
description:
for Ludum Dare #50 (April 2022)
theme: Delaying the Inevitable

Pick up Sheep, Moons and Toy Boxes --and avoid the Alarm Clock -- to put off getting up in the morning.

A cute, silly platformer.

Left and Right: A and D keys, or left and right arrows
Jump: Space key, W key,  or up arrow

You might need to click the mouse on the field of play to get Cloudie unstuck from the first place he hits, before you move him.

Software: Unity, ProCreate, and PyxelEdit

Starship Captain Becca - Art - characters and pickups
Draconimous - Art - tiles, background, furniture
Rainsong - Coding, Tenor Recorder
Enjaku - Sound Editing
